item.name: activeConnections
item.description: Current number of active (optimized) connections

item.name: bwHCAggInLan
item.description: Total optimized bytes across all application ports, in the WAN to LAN direction since the last restart of service, as measured on the LAN side

item.name: bwHCAggInWan
item.description: Total optimized bytes across all application ports, in the WAN to LAN direction since the last restart of service, as measured on the WAN side

item.name: bwHCAggOutLan
item.description: Total optimized bytes across all application ports, in the LAN to WAN direction since the last restart of service, as measured on the LAN side

item.name: bwHCAggOutWan
item.description: Total optimized bytes across all application ports, in the LAN to WAN direction since the last restart of service, as measured on the WAN side

item.name: bwPassThroughIn
item.description: Passthrough bytes in WAN to LAN direction

item.name: bwPassThroughOut
item.description: Passthrough bytes in LAN to WAN direction

item.name: bwPassThroughTotal
item.description: Total passthrough bytes

item.name: cpuLoad1
item.description: One-minute CPU load in hundreths

item.name: cpuLoad5
item.description: Five-minute CPU load in hundreths

item.name: cpuLoad15
item.description: Fifteen-minute CPU load in hundreths

item.name: cpuUtil1
item.description: Percentage CPU utilization, aggregated across all CPUs, rolling average over the past minute

item.name: dsAveDiskUtilization
item.description: Average disk utilization, a more accurate measurement of the underlying disk activities, and correlates directly to disk pressure

item.name: dsHitsTotal
item.description: Total number of datastore hits since last restart of service

item.name: dsMissTotal
item.description: Total number of datastore misses since last restart of service

item.name: establishedConnections
item.description: Current number of established (optimized) connections

item.name: halfClosedConnections
item.description: Current total number of half-closed (optimized) connections

item.name: halfOpenedConnections
item.description: Current total number of half-opened (optimized) connections

item.name: optimizedConnections
item.description: Current total number of optimized connections

item.name: passthroughConnections
item.description: Current total number of pass-through connections

item.name: totalConnections
item.description: Total number of connections

item_prototype.name: Port {#SNMPVALUE} Incoming LAN Bytes
item_prototype.description: Optimized bytes in the WAN to LAN direction since last restart of service, as measured on the LAN side

item_prototype.name: Port {#SNMPVALUE} Incoming WAN Bytes
item_prototype.description: Optimized bytes in the WAN to LAN direction since last restart of service, as measured on the WAN side

item_prototype.name: Port {#SNMPVALUE} Outgoing LAN Bytes
item_prototype.description: Optimized bytes in the LAN to WAN direction since last restart of service, as measured on the LAN side

item_prototype.name: Port {#SNMPVALUE} Outgoing WAN Bytes
item_prototype.description: Optimized bytes in the LAN to WAN direction since last restart of service, as measured on the WAN side
